name: Markdown
description:
Allows editing Markdown files within the IDE and seeing the rendered HTML in a live preview.

Includes the following features:

  • Highlighting, Completion, Links navigation, Drag and drop image to markup, and Insert actions (for images, tables, and links).
  • Live HTML preview (except Android Studio, see issue and workaround).
  • Live Table editing.
  • Document structure view.
  • Full HTML syntax support out of the box.
  • Embedded language support inside code blocks.
  • Visualizing diagrams for the Mermaid and PlantUML languages.
  • Pandoc Converter for HTML, Microsoft Word, and PDF formats.
  • Ability to customize stylesheets (CSS) for a live preview.
